```{r setup}
library(actR)
library(neotoma)
library(neotoma2lipd)
library(lipdR)
library(tidyverse)
library(geoChronR)
```

```{r}
site <- neotoma::get_site("Penegor Lake")
L <- neotoma2Lipd(site)
```

```{r}
L <- runBacon(L,bacon.dir = "~/Dropbox/MacBacon/",chron.num = 1,age.14c.var = "age",age.14c.uncertainty.var = "unc.estimate",lab.id.var = "chron.control.id")
```

```{r}
tts <- extractTs(L) %>% ts2tibble()
```
